trans-unit.source: Represents a data field that is displayed in a data-bound control that uses ASP.NET Dynamic Data features.
trans-unit.target: 代表使用 ASP.NET Dynamic Data 功能的資料繫結控制項中顯示資料欄位。

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#introduction) - [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## Introduction The DynamicField class is used by data-bound controls, such as the and controls, to display a field value that uses ASP.NET Dynamic Data features in custom pages.
trans-unit.target: 本主題內容:-[簡介](#introduction) - [宣告式語法](#declarative_syntax) # # 簡介 DynamicField 類別可供資料繫結控制項，例如和控制項，以顯示使用 ASP.NET Dynamic Data 功能在自訂頁面中的欄位值。

trans-unit.source: The DynamicField class provides functionality that resembles that of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> class.
trans-unit.target: DynamicField 類別提供的功能類似的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: However, because a DynamicField object is used in Dynamic Data applications, you can take advantage of the following Dynamic Data features: - Automatically rendering the proper control for a field by using field templates, based on the data type.
trans-unit.target: 不過，由於 DynamicField 物件用於動態資料的應用程式，您可以利用下列的動態資料功能:-自動轉譯適當的控制項欄位，使用欄位的範本，根據資料類型。

trans-unit.source: The field templates can be globally modified for the entire application.
trans-unit.target: 整個應用程式都可以修改全域的欄位樣板。

trans-unit.source: - Providing built-in data validation based on the database schema.
trans-unit.target: -提供根據資料庫結構描述的內建的資料驗證。

trans-unit.source: You can also add validation types by customizing the data model.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以加入自訂資料模型的驗證類型。

trans-unit.source: - Customizing data rendering for individual fields by using attributes in the data model or by using the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.UIHint%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -自訂個別欄位的資料轉譯使用中的資料模型的屬性，或使用<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.UIHint%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.UIHint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The DynamicField object renders each field by using a `DynamicControl` control.
trans-unit.target: DynamicField 物件使用呈現每個欄位`DynamicControl`控制項。

trans-unit.source: To specify the data field to display in a DynamicField object, set the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.DataField%2A> property to the field name.
trans-unit.target: 指定要顯示 DynamicField 物件中的資料欄位，請設定<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.DataField%2A>的欄位名稱的屬性。</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.DataField%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can apply a custom formatting string to the field value by setting the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.DataFormatString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定來套用自訂格式字串至欄位值<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.DataFormatString%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.DataFormatString%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default the formatting string is applied to field values only when the data-bound control is in read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設格式字串被套用至欄位值，只有在資料繫結控制項處於唯讀模式時。

trans-unit.source: To apply the formatting string to values displayed while the data-bound control is in edit mode, set the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.ApplyFormatInEditMode%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要將格式字串套用至資料繫結控制項處於編輯模式時顯示的值，設定<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.ApplyFormatInEditMode%2A>屬性`true`。</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.ApplyFormatInEditMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a field value is `null`, you can display a custom caption by setting the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.NullDisplayText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果欄位值為`null`，您可以藉由設定顯示自訂標題<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.NullDisplayText%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.NullDisplayText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The DynamicField object can also automatically convert empty string ("") field values to null values by setting the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: DynamicField 物件也會自動將轉換空字串 ("") 藉由設定欄位值為 null 值<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A>屬性`true`。</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Declarative Syntax ``` ```
trans-unit.target: # # 宣告式語法``` ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式來初始化<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField>類別</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField>的新執行個體

trans-unit.source: This constructor is commonly used when adding fields to a dynamically created data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 將欄位加入至動態建立的資料繫結控制項時，通常會使用這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: To dynamically add a <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField> object to a data-bound control, create a new <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField> object, set its properties, and then add it to the data-bound control's field collection.
trans-unit.target: 若要以動態方式加入<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField>物件資料繫結控制項，請建立新<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField>物件、 設定其屬性，並將其加入資料繫結控制項的欄位集合。</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField> </xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, add the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項，加入<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although you can dynamically add fields to a data-bound control, it is strongly recommended that fields be statically declared and then shown or hidden, as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 以動態方式，您就可以將欄位加入資料繫結控制項，不過強烈建議的欄位以靜態方式宣告，然後顯示或隱藏，視需要。

trans-unit.source: Statically declaring all of your fields reduces the size of the view state for the parent data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 以靜態方式宣告所有欄位可都減少的父資料繫結控制項的檢視狀態的大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the formatted string that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.DataFormatString*> property is applied to field value when the data field is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否已格式化的字串，由<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.DataFormatString*>屬性套用至欄位值的資料欄位處於編輯模式時。</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.DataFormatString*>

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>) have different display modes that allow the user to read, edit, or insert records.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結控制項 (例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>) 可讓使用者讀取、 編輯或將記錄插入的不同的顯示模式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: By default, the formatting string specified by the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.DataFormatString%2A> property is applied to field values only when the data-bound control is in read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: 依預設，格式化字串會指定由<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.DataFormatString%2A>屬性套用至欄位值的資料繫結控制項處於唯讀模式時，才。</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.DataFormatString%2A>

trans-unit.source: To apply the formatting string to values displayed while the data-bound control is in edit mode, set the ApplyFormatInEditMode property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要將格式字串套用至資料繫結控制項處於編輯模式時顯示的值，將 ApplyFormatInEditMode 屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField> object does not automatically remove the formatting when the field is updated in the data source.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > A<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField>物件不會自動移除設定格式化的資料來源中更新的欄位時。</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField>

trans-unit.source: If you do not want the formatting as part of the value stored, you will need to remove the formatting programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想格式儲存的值的一部分，您必須移除的格式以程式設計的方式。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref> applies formatting in edit mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref>適用於格式化處於編輯模式，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn"></xref> object that this <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref> object is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn"></xref>物件這個<xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref>物件相關聯。

trans-unit.source: The meta column.
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料行中。

trans-unit.source: Provides a mechanism to modify a <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl"></xref> object that was created by the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.InitializeCell*> method.
trans-unit.target: 提供一個機制來修改<xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl"></xref>所建立的物件<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.InitializeCell*>方法。</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.InitializeCell*>

trans-unit.source: The control to modify.
trans-unit.target: 要修改的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether empty string values ("") are automatically converted to null values when the data field is updated in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否將空字串值 ("") 自動轉換為 null 值的資料來源中更新資料欄位時。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes the user might enter an empty string for a field value when updating or inserting records.
trans-unit.target: 有時候使用者可能會為欄位值，更新或插入資料錄時輸入空字串。

trans-unit.source: Use the ConvertEmptyStringToNull property to specify whether an empty string value is automatically converted to null when the data field is updated in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定是否為空字串值會自動轉換為 null 的資料來源中更新資料欄位時，使用 ConvertEmptyStringToNull 屬性。

trans-unit.source: By default, a <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField> object displays null values as empty strings.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField>物件顯示 null 值為空字串。</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField>

trans-unit.source: To display a different value, set the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.NullDisplayText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示不同的值，設定<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.NullDisplayText%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.NullDisplayText%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object of the data source control that the parent control of <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField> object is bound to also has a property named <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>物件的資料來源控制項的父控制項的<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField>物件會繫結至也有一個名為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: This property performs the same function.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會執行相同的函式。

trans-unit.source: Make sure that both properties are set appropriately.
trans-unit.target: 請確定這兩個屬性會適當地設定。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to automatically convert empty string values to null values; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要自動將空字串值轉換成 null 值;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Copies the properties of the current <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref> object to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 將目前的屬性複製<xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref>到指定的物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The CopyProperties method is a helper method.
trans-unit.target: CopyProperties 方法是 helper 方法。

trans-unit.source: It is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A> method to copy the properties of the current <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField> object to the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField> object that is passed in the `newField` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 它由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A>方法來複製目前的內容<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField>物件<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField>物件傳入`newField`參數。</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField> </xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> to copy the properties of the current <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref> to.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref>來複製目前的內容<xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref>至。

trans-unit.source: Provides a mechanism for classes that derive from <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref> to override how a <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl"></xref> object is created.
trans-unit.target: 提供一個機制，衍生自的<xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref>覆寫如何<xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl"></xref>建立物件。

trans-unit.source: A new dynamic control.
trans-unit.target: 新的動態控制項。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The CreateField method is a helper method.
trans-unit.target: CreateField 方法是 helper 方法。

trans-unit.source: It is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A> method to create an empty <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField> object.
trans-unit.target: 它由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A>方法來建立空白<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField>物件。</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the data field to bind the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref> object to.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要繫結的資料欄位的名稱<xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the DataField property to specify the data field to bind to the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用 DataField 屬性來指定資料欄位繫結至<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField>物件。</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField>

trans-unit.source: The data field can be the column name or, for foreign key columns, the relationship name.
trans-unit.target: 資料欄位可以是資料行名稱，或在外部索引鍵資料行，此關聯性名稱。

trans-unit.source: By default, the specified data field is displayed by the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField> object using the field template that is associated with the field data type.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，指定的資料欄位會顯示由<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField>物件使用的欄位資料型別相關聯的欄位樣板。</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField>

trans-unit.source: You can change the field template that is rendered for the data field by setting the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.UIHint%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以變更設定呈現資料欄位的欄位樣板<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.UIHint%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.UIHint%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also format the displayed text by setting the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.DataFormatString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以藉由設定格式化顯示的文字<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.DataFormatString%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.DataFormatString%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a field value is `null`, an empty string ("") is displayed for the value by default.
trans-unit.target: 如果欄位值為`null`，空字串 ("") 會顯示預設值。

trans-unit.source: To specify an alternate caption, set the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.NullDisplayText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定替代的標題，請設定<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.NullDisplayText%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.NullDisplayText%2A>

trans-unit.source: **Note** If you want to change the display and behavior of a data field globally, you must apply attributes to your data model instead of setting this in a particular instance of the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField> object.
trans-unit.target: **請注意**如果您想要變更全域的顯示和行為的資料欄位，您必須將屬性套用至您的資料模型，而不是將此設定中的特定執行個體<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField>物件。</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Dynamic Data](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Dynamic Data](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.OnFieldChanged%2A> method is called to raise a state change event when the DataField property is set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.OnFieldChanged%2A>呼叫方法來引發 DataField 屬性設定時的狀態變更事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.OnFieldChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the DataField property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: DataField 屬性的值儲存在檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: The name of the data field that the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref> object is bound to.
trans-unit.target: 資料的名稱欄位<xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref>物件繫結至。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string that specifies the display format for the value of the data field.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定字串，指定資料欄位的值的顯示格式。

trans-unit.source: Use the DataFormatString property to specify a custom display format for the values displayed in the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用 DataFormatString 屬性來指定自訂的顯示格式的顯示值<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField>物件。</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField>

trans-unit.source: If the DataFormatString property is not set, the field value is displayed without any special formatting.
trans-unit.target: 如果 DataFormatString 屬性未設定，將欄位值會顯示不含任何特殊的格式。

trans-unit.source: By default, the formatting string is applied to the field value only when the data-bound control that contains the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField> object is in read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，格式字串套用至該欄位值，其中包含資料繫結控制項時，才<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField>物件處於唯讀模式。</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField>

trans-unit.source: To apply the formatting string to the field value while in edit mode, set the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.ApplyFormatInEditMode%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要將格式字串套用至欄位值，在編輯模式中，設定<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.ApplyFormatInEditMode%2A>屬性`true`。</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.ApplyFormatInEditMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The display format that you specify using the DataFormatString property is specific to this instance of the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField> class.
trans-unit.target: 您指定使用 DataFormatString 屬性的顯示格式為特定執行個體的<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField>類別。</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField>

trans-unit.source: You can also change the display format for a data field across the entire application by applying the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute> to your data model and setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute.DataFormatString%2A?displayProperty=fullName> named parameter in the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以變更橫跨整個應用程式資料欄位的顯示格式，藉由套用<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute>您的資料模型和設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute.DataFormatString%2A?displayProperty=fullName>名為建構函式中的參數。</xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute.DataFormatString%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Dynamic Data](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Dynamic Data](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A formatting string that specifies the display format for the value of the data field.
trans-unit.target: 格式化字串，指定資料欄位的值的顯示格式。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that no special formatting is applied to the value.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示未將特殊格式未套用的值。

trans-unit.source: Extracts the value of the data field from the current table cell and adds the value to the specified dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 擷取目前的資料表資料格的資料欄位的值，並將值加入至指定的字典。

trans-unit.source: The dictionary that will hold the cell values.
trans-unit.target: 字典，以便保存資料格的值。

trans-unit.source: The cell that contains the text or controls of the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 包含文字或控制項的資料格<xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the row state.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，指定資料列狀態。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include the values of read-only fields in `dictionary`; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>要包含在唯讀欄位的值`dictionary`，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the specified attribute value.
trans-unit.target: 擷取指定的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The key of the attribute to get.
trans-unit.target: 要取得的屬性索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The value of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that is displayed in the header of the data-bound control that contains the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示的標頭包含的資料繫結控制項中的文字<xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the HeaderText property to identify a field in a data-bound control with a friendly name.
trans-unit.target: 使用 HeaderText 屬性來識別資料繫結控制項中的欄位易記名稱。

trans-unit.source: The most common application of the HeaderText property is to provide meaningful column names to data fields in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: HeaderText 屬性的最常見的應用程式會提供有意義的資料行名稱中的資料欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: By default, the HeaderText property uses the display name set for the data field by using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DisplayNameAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，頁首會使用透過設定資料欄位的顯示名稱<xref:System.ComponentModel.DisplayNameAttribute>屬性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.DisplayNameAttribute>

trans-unit.source: If the display name is not set, the HeaderText property uses the value of the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.DataField%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果未設定的顯示名稱，頁首會使用值<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.DataField%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.DataField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text that is displayed in the header of the data-bound control that contains the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 顯示包含的資料繫結控制項的標頭中的文字<xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref> object is inside a data-bound control that is not bound to a data source control that implements the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"> </xref>物件是在未繫結至資料來源控制項實作資料繫結控制項內<xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource"></xref>介面。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether data field values are HTML-encoded before they are displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出資料欄位值是否為 HTML 編碼才能顯示在<xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the HtmlEncode property to specify whether field values are HTML-encoded to their respective string representations before they are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定欄位值是否為 HTML 編碼成其個別的字串表示法顯示之前使用 HtmlEncode 屬性。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > HTML-encoding field values helps to prevent cross-site scripting attacks and malicious content from being displayed.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > HTML 編碼的欄位值可協助防止跨網站指令碼的攻擊和惡意的內容不會再顯示。

trans-unit.source: This property should be enabled whenever possible.
trans-unit.target: 可能的話，應該啟用這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[指令碼擅用概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if field values are HTML-encoded before they are displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果欄位值經過 HTML 編碼，才能顯示。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Adds text or controls to the specified cell.
trans-unit.target: 將文字或控制項加入指定的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: The object that contains the text or controls of the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 物件，其中包含文字或控制項的<xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the function of the `cell` object.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，指定的函式`cell`物件。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the row state.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，指定資料列狀態。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row that the `cell` object is contained in.
trans-unit.target: 資料列的索引，`cell`中包含物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the caption that is displayed for a data field when the field value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定欄位值時，會將資料欄位顯示的標題<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes a field value is stored as null in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 有時欄位值會儲存為 null 的資料來源中。

trans-unit.source: You can specify a custom caption to display for data fields that have a null value by setting the NullDisplayText property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定自訂設定 NullDisplayText 屬性有 null 值的資料欄位的顯示標題。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not set, null field values are displayed as empty strings ("").
trans-unit.target: 如果未設定這個屬性，null 的欄位值顯示為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The caption that is displayed for a data field when the field value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 欄位值時，會將資料欄位顯示的標題<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets the read-only state of the dynamic field.
trans-unit.target: 取得動態欄位的唯讀狀態。

trans-unit.source: If the ReadOnly property is `true`, the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField> control loads a read-only template.
trans-unit.target: ReadOnly 屬性是否`true`、<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField>控制項載入唯讀範本。</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField>

trans-unit.source: This property requires that view state be enabled.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性需要啟用檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: The read-only state of the dynamic field.
trans-unit.target: 動態欄位的唯讀狀態。

trans-unit.source: Sets an attribute that is associated with the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 設定屬性相關聯<xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the attribute to be set.
trans-unit.target: 要設定之屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The attribute value.
trans-unit.target: 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the sort expression that is used when the data field is used to sort the data source by.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定當使用資料欄位來排序的資料來源所使用的排序運算式。

trans-unit.source: The SortExpression property tries to use the value of the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn.SortExpression%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the column object that is associated with the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField> object by setting the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.DataField%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: SortExpression 屬性便會嘗試使用的值<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn.SortExpression%2A?displayProperty=fullName>物件相關聯的資料行屬性<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField>物件藉由設定<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.DataField%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.DataField%2A> </xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField> </xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn.SortExpression%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.OnFieldChanged%2A> method is called to raise a state change event when the SortExpression property is set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.OnFieldChanged%2A>呼叫方法來引發 SortExpression 屬性設定時的狀態變更事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.OnFieldChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the SortExpression property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: SortExpression 屬性的值儲存在檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: The sort expression that is used when the data field is used to sort the data source by.
trans-unit.target: 當資料欄位來排序的資料來源所使用的排序運算式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref> object is inside a data-bound control that is not bound to a data source control that implements the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"> </xref>物件是在未繫結至資料來源控制項實作資料繫結控制項內<xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource"></xref>介面。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the field template to use for displaying the data field.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要用來顯示資料欄位的欄位樣板。

trans-unit.source: Use the UIHint property to specify the field template to use to display the UI for a data field.
trans-unit.target: 使用 UIHint 屬性來指定要用來顯示資料欄位的使用者介面的欄位樣板。

trans-unit.source: Field templates by default are user controls and their names contain a suffix to identify field templates that are used for edit operations and insert operations.
trans-unit.target: 預設的欄位樣板是使用者控制項，而且其名稱包含識別欄位的範本，可用於編輯作業和插入作業的後置詞。

trans-unit.source: The suffixes are _edit and _insert, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 尾碼會分別為 （_e） 和 （_i）。

trans-unit.source: When you set a value to the UIHint property, you set the name without the suffixes.
trans-unit.target: 當您將值設 UIHint 屬性時，您可以設定沒有後置字元的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic Data will identify the current mode of the data field and will render the correct field template.
trans-unit.target: 動態資料會識別目前的資料欄位的模式，然後將會呈現正確的欄位樣板。

trans-unit.source: If the UIHint property is not set, Dynamic Data by default will render the field template based on the field type.
trans-unit.target: 如果未設定 UIHint 屬性，動態資料依預設會轉譯根據欄位類型的欄位樣板。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Dynamic Data Scaffolding](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 動態資料 Scaffolding](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The field template that you specify using the UIHint property is specific to this instance of the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField> class.
trans-unit.target: 您指定使用 UIHint 屬性的欄位樣板是類別的特定執行個體<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField>類別。</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField>

trans-unit.source: You can also change the field template used by a data field across the entire application by applying the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.UIHintAttribute> to your data model.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以變更使用橫跨整個應用程式藉由套用資料欄位的欄位樣板<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.UIHintAttribute>資料模型。</xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.UIHintAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Setting the UIHint property overrides the metadata applied to the data model.
trans-unit.target: UIHint 屬性設定會覆寫套用至資料模型的中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: For more information about metadata attributes, see [ASP.NET Dynamic Data](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需中繼資料屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Dynamic Data](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.OnFieldChanged%2A> method is called to raise a state change event when the UIHint property is set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.OnFieldChanged%2A>呼叫方法來引發 UIHint 屬性設定時的狀態變更事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.OnFieldChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the UIHint property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 值的屬性是 UIHint 在檢視中儲存狀態。

trans-unit.source: The name of the field template to use for displaying the data field.
trans-unit.target: 用來顯示資料欄位的欄位樣板名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the control validates client input.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定控制項是否會驗證用戶端輸入。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control validates client input; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控制項驗證用戶端輸入。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl.ValidationGroup*> object that this <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref> object is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl.ValidationGroup*>物件這個<xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref>物件相關聯。</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl.ValidationGroup*>

trans-unit.source: The name of the validation group to which this validation control belongs.
trans-unit.target: 這個驗證控制項所屬的驗證群組名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。
